pli-tv-kd11:1.1.2: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.6: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.9: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.2: “kathañhi nāma paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.5: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.8: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.11: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.14: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.17: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.20: “ananucchavikaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ moghapurisānaṁ ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.21: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.22: saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.23: saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.26: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.29: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.30: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.31: Atha khvetaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānañceva appasādāya pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya dupposatāya mahicchatāya asantuṭṭhitāya saṅgaṇikāya kosajjassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitvā anekapariyāyena subharatāya suposatāya appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitvā bhikkhūnaṁ tadanucchavikaṁ tadanulomikaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ karotu.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.2: Paṭhamaṁ paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū codetabbā, codetvā sāretabbā, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbā, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.4: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.7: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.10: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.11: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.16: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe… saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.19: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.22: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.24: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.30: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe… saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.33: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.36: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.38: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.44: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe… saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.47: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.50: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.52: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.55: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:2.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.

pli-tv-kd11:2.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.

pli-tv-kd11:3.1.35: Āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:3.1.36: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.2: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.5: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.6: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.7: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.9: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.10: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.11: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.1: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.2: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.3: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.5: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.6: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.7: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.8: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.9: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.10: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.11: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:5.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.1: Atha kho saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.2: Te saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.3: “mayaṁ, āvuso, saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṁ pātema, netthāraṁ vattāma, kathaṁ nu kho amhehi paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.6: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.2: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.6: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.9: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:8.1.2: Tehi, bhikkhave, paṇḍukalohitakehi bhikkhūhi saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:8.1.3: ‘mayaṁ, bhante, saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṁ pātema, netthāraṁ vattāma, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.2: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.3: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.6: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.8: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.12: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.14: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.18: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.20: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.23: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.3: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.5: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.7: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.10: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.12: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.15: “ananucchavikaṁ, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.16: Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.18: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.22: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2: Paṭhamaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.4: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.6: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.7: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.11: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.13: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.16: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.22: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.24: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.27: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.32: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.2: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.7: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.8: Acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.9: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.11: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.14: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.17: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.20: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.23: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.26: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.29: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.32: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.34: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.35: Āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.36: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.38.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.39: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.40: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.41: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.42: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.43: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.44: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.45: Codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.46: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.48: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.51: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.54: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.57: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.60: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.63: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.66: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.69: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.71: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.72: Āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.73: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ niyassakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.75.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.76: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.79: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.80: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.81: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.82: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.83: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.84: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.85: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.86: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.87: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.88: eko bālo hoti, abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.90: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.91: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.92: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.93: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.94: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.95: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.96: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, niyassakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.105: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena niyassakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.1: Atha kho saṅgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.3: So saṅghena niyassakammakato kalyāṇamitte sevamāno bhajamāno payirupāsamāno uddisāpento paripucchanto bahussuto hoti, āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.4: Sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.5: “ahaṁ, āvuso, saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.9: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena niyassakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.12.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.13: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.14: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.15: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.16: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena niyassakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.17: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.18: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.19: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.20: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:12.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, seyyasakena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:12.1.3: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.3: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.4: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.7: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.9: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.13: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.15: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.19: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu saṅghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.21: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.24: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā honti alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.3: mālāvacchaṁ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, mañjarikaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, vidhūtikaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, āveḷaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, uracchadaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.4: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, mañjarikaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, vidhūtikaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, āveḷaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, uracchadaṁ harantipi harāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.5: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.6: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.7: gāyantiyāpi naccanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyanti, gāyantiyāpi vādenti, gāyantiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.8: vādentiyāpi naccanti, vādentiyāpi gāyanti, vādentiyāpi vādenti, vādentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.9: lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.1: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.2: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti, tharusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.3: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti, rathassapi purato dhāvantipi ādhāvantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.5: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kāsīsu vassaṁvuṭṭho sāvatthiṁ gacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kīṭāgiriṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena, okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.4: “kvāyaṁ abalabalo viya mandamando viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya?
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.6: Amhākaṁ pana ayyā assajipunabbasukā saṇhā sakhilā sukhasambhāsā mihitapubbaṅgamā ehisvāgatavādino abbhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pubbabhāsino.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.8: Addasā kho aññataro upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ kīṭāgirismiṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.9: disvāna yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.1: Atha kho so upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ gharaṁ netvā bhojetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.3: “Sāvatthiṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, gamissāmi bhagavantaṁ dassanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.4: “Tena hi, bhante, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda, evañca vadehi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.6: Assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.8: mālāvacchaṁ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, mañjarikaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, vidhūtikaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, āveḷaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi, uracchadaṁ karontipi kārāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.9: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, mañjarikaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, vidhūtikaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, āveḷaṁ harantipi harāpentipi, uracchadaṁ harantipi harāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.10: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.11: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.13: Lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.14: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.15: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti, tharusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.16: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti, rathassapi purato dhāvantipi ādhāvantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.18: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.22: Yepi te, bhante, manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṁ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.23: Yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.25: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā kīṭāgiriṁ bhikkhū pahiṇeyya, yathāyaṁ kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāso saṇṭhaheyyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa upāsakassa paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.2: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.3: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.9: appakilamathena ca ahaṁ, bhante, addhānaṁ āgato.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.10: Idhāhaṁ, bhante, kāsīsu vassaṁvuṭṭho sāvatthiṁ āgacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasariṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.11: Atha khvāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kīṭāgiriṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.12: Addasā kho maṁ, bhante, aññataro upāsako kīṭāgirismiṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.13: disvāna yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.17: Atha kho, bhante, so upāsako maṁ gharaṁ netvā bhojetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.19: ‘Sāvatthiṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, gamissāmi bhagavantaṁ dassanāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.20: ‘Tena hi, bhante, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda, evañca vadehi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.22: Assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.26: Yepi te, bhante, manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṁ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.27: Yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.29: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā kīṭāgiriṁ bhikkhū pahiṇeyya, yathāyaṁ kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāso saṇṭhaheyyā”’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.2: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.6: Yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṁ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.7: Yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.12: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā evarūpaṁ anācāraṁ ācarissanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.13: mālāvacchaṁ ropessantipi ropāpessantipi, siñcissantipi siñcāpessantipi, ocinissantipi ocināpessantipi, ganthessantipi ganthāpessantipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, mañjarikaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, vidhūtikaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, āveḷaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, uracchadaṁ karissantipi kārāpessantipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.14: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, mañjarikaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, vidhūtikaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, vaṭaṁsakaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, āveḷaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi, uracchadaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.15: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjissanti, ekathālakepi pivissanti, ekāsanepi nisīdissanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, vikālepi bhuñjissanti, majjampi pivissanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhāressanti, naccissantipi, gāyissantipi, vādessantipi, lāsessantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.16: naccantiyāpi naccissanti, naccantiyāpi gāyissanti, naccantiyāpi vādessanti, naccantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.17: gāyantiyāpi naccissanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyissanti, gāyantiyāpi vādessanti, gāyantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.18: vādentiyāpi naccissanti, vādentiyāpi gāyissanti, vādentiyāpi vādessanti, vādentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.19: lāsentiyāpi naccissanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyissanti, lāsentiyāpi vādessanti, lāsentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.20: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷissanti, dasapadepi kīḷissanti, ākāsepi kīḷissanti, parihārapathepi kīḷissanti, santikāyapi kīḷissanti, khalikāyapi kīḷissanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷissanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷissanti, akkhenapi kīḷissanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷissanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷissanti mokkhacikāyapi kīḷissanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷissanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷissanti, rathakenapi kīḷissanti, dhanukenapi kīḷissanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷissanti, manesikāyapi kīḷissanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.21: hatthismimpi sikkhissanti, assasmimpi sikkhissanti, rathasmimpi sikkhissanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhissanti, tharusmimpi sikkhissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.22: hatthissapi purato dhāvissanti, assassapi purato dhāvissanti, rathassapi purato dhāvissantipi ādhāvissantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.24: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.31: “gacchatha tumhe, sāriputtā, kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karotha, tumhākaṁ ete saddhivihārino”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.32: “Kathaṁ mayaṁ, bhante, assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoma, caṇḍā te bhikkhū pharusā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.33: “Tena hi tumhe, sāriputtā, bahukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ gacchathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.2: paṭhamaṁ assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū codetabbā, codetvā sāretabbā, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbā, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.5: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.6: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.7: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.12: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.13: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.14: Saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.16: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṁ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.22: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.23: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.24: Saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.26: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṁ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.28: Kataṁ saṅghena assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.30: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.2: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.6: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.7: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.13: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.14: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.15: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.18.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.19: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.21: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.22: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.23: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.24: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.25: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.26: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.27: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.28: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.29: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.30: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.31: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.32: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.33: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ pabbājanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.35.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.36: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.39: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.40: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.41: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.42: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.43: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.44: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.45: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.46: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.47: Kāyikena davena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena davena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena davena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.48: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.49: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.50: Kāyikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.51: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.52: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.53: Kāyikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.54: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.55: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.56: Kāyikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.57: imehi, kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.1: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.2: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.3: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.5: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.6: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.7: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.8: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.9: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.10: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.11: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.12: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.13: Eko kāyikena davena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena davena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena davena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.14: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.15: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.16: Eko kāyikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.17: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.18: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.19: Eko kāyikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.20: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.21: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.22: Eko kāyikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.23: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:15.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.1: Atha kho sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.3: Te saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṁ pātenti, na netthāraṁ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.8: “kathañhi nāma assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṁ pātessanti, na netthāraṁ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.14: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṁ pātenti, na netthāraṁ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.21: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṁ pātessanti, na netthāraṁ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.12.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.13: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.14: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.15: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.16: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.17: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.18: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.19: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.20: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, pabbājanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.3: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.2: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.3: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.6: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.8: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.13: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.15: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.18: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino āvāsiko hoti, navakammiko dhuvabhattiko.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.2: Yadā citto gahapati saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimantetukāmo hoti tadā na āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ anapaloketvā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimanteti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū, āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno, āyasmā ca mahākaccāno, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko, āyasmā ca mahākappino, āyasmā ca mahācundo, āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca revato, āyasmā ca upāli, āyasmā ca ānando, āyasmā ca rāhulo, kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena macchikāsaṇḍo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.4: Assosi kho citto gahapati therā kira bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppattāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.6: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā sāriputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.7: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmatā sāriputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito there bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.3: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.5: “pubbe khvāyaṁ citto gahapati yadā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimantetukāmo na maṁ anapaloketvā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimanteti;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.6: sodāni maṁ anapaloketvā there bhikkhū nimantesi;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.7: duṭṭhodānāyaṁ citto gahapati anapekkho virattarūpo mayī”ti cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.10: tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.11: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.14: “kiṁ me karissati ayyo sudhammo adhivāsento vā anadhivāsento vā”ti āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.1: Atha kho citto gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.3: “yannūnāhaṁ cittassa gahapatino therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭiyattaṁ passeyyan”ti pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatino nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.4: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.5: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā sudhammo etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.6: “pahūtaṁ kho te idaṁ, gahapati, khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyattaṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.7: ekā ca kho idha natthi yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.8: “Bahumhi vata, bhante, ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṁ yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.9: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhante, dakkhiṇāpathakā vāṇijā puratthimaṁ janapadaṁ agamaṁsu vāṇijjāya.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.11: Atha kho sā, bhante, kukkuṭī kākena saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ kappesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.13: Yadā kho so, bhante, kukkuṭapotako kākavassaṁ vassitukāmo hoti, kākakukkuṭīti vassati;
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.14: yadā kukkuṭivassaṁ vassitukāmo hoti, kukkuṭikākāti vassati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.15: Evameva kho, bhante, bahumhi ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṁ yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.1: “Akkosasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.8: tatiyampi kho āyasmā sudhammo cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.9: “akkosasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.12: “Sāvatthiṁ kho ahaṁ, gahapati, gamissāmi bhagavantaṁ dassanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.13: “Tena hi, bhante, yañca attanā bhaṇitaṁ, yañca mayā bhaṇitaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocehi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.14: Anacchariyaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhante, yaṁ ayyo sudhammo punadeva macchikāsaṇḍaṁ paccāgaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.1: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.2: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sudhammo yañca attanā bhaṇitaṁ yañca cittena gahapatinā bhaṇitaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.5: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.6: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁsessasi, hīnena vambhessasi?
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.10: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.2: paṭhamaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.4: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.9: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.12: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.17: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.20: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.24: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.2: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.6: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.7: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.13: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.14: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.15: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.18.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.19: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.21: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.22: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.23: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.24: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.25: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.26: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.27: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.28: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.29: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.30: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.31: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.32: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.33: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.2: Gihīnaṁ alābhāya parisakkati, gihīnaṁ anatthāya parisakkati, gihīnaṁ anāvāsāya parisakkati, gihī akkosati paribhāsati, gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.5: Gihīnaṁ buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, gihīnaṁ dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, gihīnaṁ saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, gihī hīnena khuṁseti hīnena vambheti, gihīnaṁ dhammikaṁ paṭissavaṁ na saccāpeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.7: Pañcannaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.8: Eko gihīnaṁ alābhāya parisakkati, eko gihīnaṁ anatthāya parisakkati, eko gihīnaṁ anāvāsāya parisakkati, eko gihī akkosati paribhāsati, eko gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.9: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.10: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.11: Eko gihīnaṁ buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko gihīnaṁ dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko gihīnaṁ saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko gihī hīnena khuṁseti hīnena vambheti, eko gihīnaṁ dhammikaṁ paṭissavaṁ na saccāpeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.12: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:21.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.1: Atha kho saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.3: So saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.7: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhiṁ cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ detu—
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.4: paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.6: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ dadeyya cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.9: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ deti cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.10: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtassa dānaṁ cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.12: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūto cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.13: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.1: Tena, bhikkhave, sudhammena bhikkhunā anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā citto gahapati khamāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.4: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.7: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.8: ‘khama, gahapati, imassa bhikkhuno, ahaṁ taṁ pasādemī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.10: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā taṁ āpattiṁ desāpetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.2: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.3: “ahaṁ, āvuso, saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.6: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.12.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.13: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.14: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.15: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.16: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.17: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.18: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.19: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.20: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, sudhammena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.3: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.8: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.9: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.12: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.19: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.24: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ passitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.7: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.11: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ passituṁ?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.15: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.2: paṭhamaṁ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.4: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.9: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.10: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.12: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.18: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.19: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.21: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.24: Kataṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.26: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.2: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.6: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.7: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.13: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.14: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.15: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.18.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.19: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.22: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.23: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.24: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.25: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.26: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.27: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.28: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.29: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.30: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.31: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.32: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.33: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.35.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.36: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.39: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.40: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.41: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.42: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.43: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.44: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.45: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.46: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.47: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.48: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.50: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.51: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.52: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.53: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.54: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.55: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.56: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.1: Āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.33: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.35: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.37: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.1: Atha kho saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.3: So saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.5: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.6: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.7: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.8: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.9: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṁ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.10: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.11: “ahaṁ, āvuso, saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.14: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.8: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati—
