pli-tv-kd11:28.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.11: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.12: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṁ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.14: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.15: Pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, bhikkhuṁ bhikkhūhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.17: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.18: Gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiye sevati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.19: bhikkhū na sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya na sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.21: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.22: Pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.23: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.24: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.25: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.26: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.27: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.28: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.2: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.6: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.8: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.9: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.11: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.12: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṁ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.14: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.15: Na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na bhikkhuṁ bhikkhūhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.17: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.18: Na gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.20: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.21: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, na ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāti, na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.22: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.23: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.24: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.25: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, channena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.3: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.8: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.9: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.12: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.13: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.19: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.20: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.23: Paṭippassaddhaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.24: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.7: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.11: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.15: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.18: paṭhamaṁ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.20: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.21: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.25: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.26: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.28: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.34: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.35: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.37: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.40: Kataṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.42: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.46.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.47: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.48: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.49: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.50: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.51: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.52: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.53: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.54: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.55: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.56: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.57: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.58: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.59: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.60: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.61: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.63.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.64: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.65: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.66: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.67: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.68: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.69: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.70: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.71: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.72: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.73: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.74: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.75: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.76: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.77: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.78: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.80.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.81: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.84: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.85: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.86: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.87: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.88: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.89: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.90: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.91: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.92: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.93: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.95: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.96: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.97: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.98: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.99: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.100: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.101: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.103.1: Āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.110: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.135: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.137: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.139: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.149: Atha kho saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.151: So saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.152: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.153: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.154: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.155: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.156: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ, na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.157: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṁ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.158: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.159: “ahaṁ, āvuso, saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.162: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.163.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.164: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.165: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.166: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.167: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.169: pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.170: pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.171: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, bhikkhuṁ bhikkhūhi bhedeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.172: gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiye sevati, bhikkhū na sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya na sikkhati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.173: pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti, pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.174: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.175: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.176: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.177: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.179.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.180: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.181: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.182: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.183: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.184: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.185: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.186: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.187: na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, na bhikkhuṁ bhikkhūhi bhedeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.188: na gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.189: na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, na ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāti, na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.190: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.191: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.192: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.193: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.196: Tena bhikkhave, channena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.197: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.202: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.203: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.206: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.207: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.208: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.213: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.214: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.215: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.217: Paṭippassaddhaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.218: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.3: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.4: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū ariṭṭhassa nāma kira bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.5: “Tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.8: “saccaṁ kira te, āvuso ariṭṭha, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.9: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.10: “Evaṁ byā kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.5: Anekapariyāyenāvuso ariṭṭha, antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.7: Appassādā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.8: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.17: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.18: Evampi kho ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati—
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.19: “evaṁ byā kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.1: Yato ca kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ, atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.2: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.3: “saccaṁ kira te, ariṭṭha, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.4: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.5: “Evaṁ byā kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.6: “Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mayā evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāsi?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.7: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.9: Appassādā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.10: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.19: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.20: Atha ca pana tvaṁ, moghapurisa, attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhasi, attānañca khaṇasi, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavasi.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.21: Tañhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.25: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.2: paṭhamaṁ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo, āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.4: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.5: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.7: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.11: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.12: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.14: Saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.16: Yassāyasmato khamati ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.22: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.23: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.25: Saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.27: Yassāyasmato khamati ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.30: Kataṁ saṅghena ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.32: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.34: ‘ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo, saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.2: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.6: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.7: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.13: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.14: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.15: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.17: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme adhammakammadvādasakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.18.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.19: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.21: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.22: Āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.23: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti, āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.24: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.25: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.26: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.27: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.28: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.29: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.30: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.31: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.32: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.33: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.34: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme dhammakammadvādasakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.35.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.36: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.39: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.40: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.41: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.42: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.43: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.44: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.45: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.46: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.47: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.48: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.50: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.51: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.52: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.53: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.54: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.55: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.56: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.57: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage ukkhepanīyakamme ākaṅkhamānachakkaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.58.1: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.65: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.78: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme tecattālīsavattaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.1: Atha kho saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.3: So saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.5: “kathañhi nāma ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamissatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.12: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamissati?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.16: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṁ deti, sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ …
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.9: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.10: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.11: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.12: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme nappaṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.13.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.14: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṁ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.15: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.16: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.17: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.18: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ …
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.21: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.22: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.23: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.24: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme paṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.3: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.8: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.9: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.12: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.13: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.19: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.20: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.23: Paṭippassaddhaṁ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.24: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.25: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.26: Kammakkhandhako paṭhamo. Imamhi khandhake vatthū satta.
